item.title: Fullstack Rust Vue
item.description: Creating a full-stack Rust & Vue app This is actually my first attempt at documenting my thoughts as I approach a new project. So, not only will I be learning the best way to write things down as I do them, but also how to setup a Rust backend using Axum and SQLx in Docker. What could go wrong? For anyone following along, this post does assume that you have npm and Rust already installed.
